views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Ref Rating Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refRatingId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refRatingId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Parent Rating Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.parentRatingId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.parentRatingId],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Ref Label",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refLabel,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refLabel]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Description",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.description,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.description]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Ref Icon",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refIcon,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refIcon]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Ref Color",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refColor,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.refColor]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Sort Order",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.sortOrder,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.sortOrder],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_R_Rating_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
